key_points: Tom Brady and the Tampa Bay Buccaneers won Super Bowl LV against Patrick Mahomes and the Kansas City Chiefs, 31-9.
This victory marks Tom Brady's 7th Super Bowl win, the most of any player in NFL history.
The internet reacted with a variety of memes and jokes celebrating and teasing Brady's achievement.
Brady's performance, along with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers' defense led by Todd Bowles, was key to their victory.
The article shares a collection of favorite memes from after the Super Bowl, including jokes about Brady, his age, and his partnership with Rob Gronkowski.
NBA champion Robert Horry and singer Ariana Grande, both connected to the number 7, were mentioned in memes.
The article also touches on discussions of Brady compared to other sports 'G.O.A.T.s' (Greatest Of All Time).
LeBron James and Lindsey Berra (Yogi Berra's granddaughter) were quoted acknowledging Brady's achievements.
Despite making fun of Brady, the article concedes his undeniable success in the NFL.
It ends with a note that while Brady remains the reigning champ, next NFL season offers another chance for teams.
